This is a Node.js Express backend for a micro-lending management app. Use RESTful conventions for all endpoints. Use Mongoose for MongoDB models. Endpoints should cover users, loans, borrowers, payments, lines, collections, commissions, analytics, settings, and authentication. Use dotenv for configuration. All code should be modular and follow best practices for Express apps.
